import Lenis from"@studio-freight/lenis";export var customLenis=function customLenis(){var lenis=new Lenis({duration:1.2,easing:function easing(t){return Math.min(1,1.001-Math.pow(2,-10*t));},// https://www.desmos.com/calculator/brs54l4xou
direction:"vertical",// vertical, horizontal
gestureDirection:"vertical",// vertical, horizontal, both
smooth:true,mouseMultiplier:1,smoothTouch:false,touchMultiplier:2,infinite:false});function raf(time){lenis.raf(time);requestAnimationFrame(raf);}requestAnimationFrame(raf);};
